A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is nothing but a parody of a once great franchise. It laughed at itself while patronizing it's audience with constant explanations of what we all just saw happen. This self plagiarizing movie lost on almost every level. The movies only accomplishment was to prove once again that Hollywood knows they can polish a turd with loud explosions\, vast special effects shots and state of the art practical effects\, slap a logo on it and it will sell.
